content.rendered:
Kevin and I will both be attending WordCamp US this weekend in Philadelphia and we would love to meet you!

We will not be presenting, but we’ll be around to discuss Piklist (and anything else you want to chat about).

If you’re attending WordCamp US this weekend and want to meet up, email us at support@piklist.com or send us a tweet, @piklist.

Looking forward to meeting you.
